Satan could not hinder the plan of salvation. Jesus was crucified, and arose again the third day. He told his angels that he would make 
                                                                           110
even the crucifixion and resurrection tell to his advantage. He was willing that those who professed faith in Jesus should believe that the laws regulating the Jewish sacrifices and offerings ceased at the death of Christ, if he could push them further, and make them believe that the law of ten commandments died also with Christ.
